title: Remoteok Job Scraper Input
description: Scrape remote job listings from Remoteok.com or custom job API endpoints. Filter by keywords, location, and job posting date.

url.title: API URL
url.description: Custom API endpoint URL. If not provided, uses Remoteok's default JSON API (https://remoteok.com/remote-jobs.json). Should return JSON array of job objects.

keyword.title: Search Keyword
keyword.description: Keyword to filter jobs (e.g., 'python', 'developer', 'designer'). If empty, all jobs will be returned. The keyword is matched against job titles, companies, descriptions, and tags.

location.title: Location Filter
location.description: Filter jobs by location (e.g., 'San Francisco', 'New York', 'Remote'). Case-insensitive partial matching.

jobDate.title: Minimum Job Date
jobDate.description: Filter jobs posted after this date (YYYY-MM-DD format). Example: '2024-01-01'

maxJobs.title: Maximum Jobs
maxJobs.description: Maximum number of jobs to collect. Set to 0 for unlimited (will process all matching jobs).

batchSize.title: Batch Size
batchSize.description: Number of jobs to process in each batch. Larger batches are faster but use more memory.

proxyConfiguration.title: Proxy Configuration
proxyConfiguration.description: Proxy settings for accessing the job API. Use Apify Proxy for best results.
